data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Al Gharbiyah words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Gharbiyah, Egypt
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Al Gharbiyah that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Al Gharbiyah against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Al Gharbiyah.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Beja, Bedawi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Al Gharbiyah, Egypt today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 3,920,800 people living in Al Gharbiyah, Egypt. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Over 86.87 percent of the people of Al Gharbiyah are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
